preqs: Twelve credit points of first-year Arts units.

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ACL1%, AEH1%, AMU1%, ASA1%, ATS1%, AZA1%}

description: This unit provides a series of structured strategies and devices for developing a systematic approach to melodic based improvisation skills. It looks at melodic elements and structures in terms of modes, intonation, microtonal inflections and flavours and draws upon systems and processes for developing improvisatory approaches from jazz, blues, Hindustani music, Arabic music, Latin music, Western art music and other musical sources. The unit involves both practical and theoretical components.
